logo.alt: My Private Tutor Online - Premium Educational Services

hero.title: World-Class Education, At Your Fingertips

schoolShields.sectionTitle: We help students place at top 10 UK schools and universities

aboutSection.title: World-Class Education, At Your Fingertips
aboutSection.subtitle: Founded on trust. Built on results. Delivered by experts.
aboutSection.description: At the heart of My Private Tutor Online is a singular vision: academic support that is both exceptional and deeply personal. Founded in 2010 by Elizabeth Burrows‚Äîa Cambridge-accepted educator and former Forbes journalist‚Äîthe company began not as a business, but as a trusted network of elite colleagues she met throughout her international tutoring career.
aboutSection.continuedDescription: What started as a circle of personal recommendations has since evolved‚Äîorganically and exclusively‚Äîinto one of the UK's most respected names in specialist private tutoring. As testament, My Private Tutor Online is honoured to be featured in Tatler's Address Book and recognised as School Guide UK's 'Top Pick' for private tuition.
aboutSection.finalDescription: Today, the ethos remains the same: every tutor is handpicked, every match thoughtfully made, and every family accommodated directly by Elizabeth and her team.

trustIndicators.sectionDescription: Trusted by Britain's Most Distinguished Families

indicators.title: Fit For a King
indicators.description: Our services are trusted by prominent families, including VIPs and royalty.
indicators.imageAlt: Royal endorsement - Invitation-only service trusted by royal families and high-profile clients

indicators.title: Examiner insight
indicators.description: Our Tier 1 tutors actually write/mark the real tests your child takes. Such insider perspective is rare.
indicators.imageAlt: Examiner insight - Tutors who are actual examiners providing unique academic advantage

indicators.title: By Invitation Only
indicators.description: Elizabeth's international career has allowed her to personally work alongside almost all our tutors, while others have been recommended by trusted colleagues. She personally vets every tutor, ensuring only the best make the team.
indicators.imageAlt: Built on trust - Premium tutoring service with vetted educators and proven track record

indicators.title: Rooted in Britain, Appreciated Worldwide
indicators.description: We know British education inside and out and bring that knowledge to families across the globe.
indicators.imageAlt: British heritage and global network - Personal tutoring approach with international reach

studentJourney.sectionSubtitle: From First Enquiry to Outstanding Results
studentJourney.sectionDescription: Our proven 5-step process ensures every student receives the personalised attention they deserve, leading to exceptional academic outcomes.

steps.title: Initial Enquiry
steps.description: Get in touch with our educational consultants to discuss your specific needs and academic goals.

steps.title: Personalised Assessment
steps.description: Comprehensive evaluation of current knowledge, learning style, and areas for improvement.

steps.title: Tailored Learning Plan
steps.description: Custom curriculum designed specifically for your needs, with clear milestones and objectives.

steps.title: Expert Tutoring
steps.description: One-to-one sessions with our Oxbridge-educated tutors using our interactive online platform.

steps.title: Outstanding Results
steps.description: Achieve your academic goals with proven grade improvements and enhanced confidence.

testimonials.sectionSubtitle: Discover why parents and students trust us with their most important educational goals. Real testimonials from real families.

testimonials.quote: The transformation in our daughter's confidence and grades has been remarkable. From struggling with mathematics to achieving A* grades, the personalised approach made all the difference.
testimonials.author: Lady Catherine Wellington

testimonials.quote: As featured in Tatler, My Private Tutor Online represents the gold standard in educational excellence. The calibre of tutors and results speak for themselves.
testimonials.author: The Hon. James Pemberton

testimonials.quote: Our son went from predicted C grades to achieving A*A*A at A-Level. The Oxbridge preparation was exceptional - he's now reading Natural Sciences at Cambridge.
testimonials.author: Mrs Sarah Fitzgerald

services.sectionDescription: We work with a wide range of learners, offering guidance and transformation at every level:

services.title: Primary
services.description: Comprehensive support for primary school students across all core subjects and entrance exam preparation

services.title: Secondary
services.description: Expert secondary education support covering GCSE, A-Level and IB programmes for academic excellence

services.title: Entrance Exams
services.description: Specialist preparation for competitive UK school entry examinations (4+, 7+, 11+, 13+, 16+)

services.title: Uni & Beyond
services.description: Complete university application support including Oxbridge admissions and undergraduate academic writing
services.featureImageAlt: Oxbridge success - University admissions coaching and academic writing support

services.title: Online Homeschooling
services.description: Comprehensive online education programmes providing structured homeschooling with qualified teachers

services.title: SEN Support
services.description: Specialist educational needs support with experienced tutors trained in learning differences and disabilities

services.title: London In-Person
services.description: Premium face-to-face tutoring sessions available across London with our most experienced educators

whoWeSupport.sectionDescription: We work with a wide range of learners, offering guidance and transformation at every level:

supportAreas.title: Primary and Secondary school learners, across all subjects
supportAreas.description: Comprehensive support for students from early years through secondary education in all subject areas

supportAreas.title: Competitive UK school entry (4+, 7+, 11+, 13+, 16+)
supportAreas.description: Expert preparation for all major UK independent school entrance examinations

supportAreas.title: GCSE, A-Level and IB excellence
supportAreas.description: Specialist tutoring to achieve top grades in GCSE, A-Level and International Baccalaureate programmes

supportAreas.title: UCAS applications, including Oxbridge admissions
supportAreas.description: Complete university application support with particular expertise in Oxford and Cambridge admissions

supportAreas.title: Specialist exams (TMUA, LNAT, BMAT, SAT, ACT, IELTS)
supportAreas.description: Targeted preparation for specialist university entrance and aptitude tests

supportAreas.title: University level essay and thesis support
supportAreas.description: Academic writing support for undergraduate and postgraduate students

results.sectionTitle: Results that Speak for Themselves (No styling revisions made yet, only moved)
results.sectionDescription: Our track record speaks for itself. Real results from real students who have achieved their academic goals through our personalised tutoring approach.

statistics.description: families we've successfully guided to academic excellence
statistics.imageAlt: Families served by My Private Tutor Online - 500+ families guided to academic excellence

statistics.label: GCSE Grade Improvement

statistics.label: Tutor Acceptance Rate

statistics.imageAlt: Selective tutor acceptance - Less than 10% of tutors accepted for our premium service

cta.title: This Is Tutoring at Its Best
cta.description: From prep school entry to Oxbridge preparation, {siteName} delivers expert tuition for exceptional futures.

founderQuote.quote: Parents come to us when something truly matters‚Äîan entrance exam, a lost sense of confidence, a desire for academic stretch. They stay with us because we deliver real progress, quietly and expertly. This is not a tutoring directory. This is a bespoke service for ambitious families looking for trusted partners in their child's academic career.
founderQuote.author: Elizabeth Burrows

royalTestimonial.quote: Hi Elizabeth, I found out today that the two princes and the princess have all been offered places for next year. The family are delighted and would like me to pass on their sincerest thanks for all your hard work.
royalTestimonial.author: Royal Representative
